name: Breakfast
special_instructions: The most important meal of the day, and for a good reason. *Choice of bread Butter Toast or Butter Croissant - 70/-

name: Croissants
special_instructions: Croissants are named for their historical crescent shape, The dough is layered with butter, rolled folded several times into a thin sheet, in a technique called laminating.

name: Sandwiches
special_instructions: The Sandwich is named after its supposed inventor, John Montahu, 4th Earl of Sandwich.
